data.name: Device.CreateOrEdit.Label.IsMobile.Hint
data.value:
Set "true" if the device is installed on a mobile object
to get the location of the device.

data.name: Device.CreateOrEdit.Label.ShowOnMain.Hint
data.value:
Show the device location on the main map on "Overview" page.
For mobile devices, the location of the installation place is displayed.
To track mobile devices, use monitors or "Tracker" in the "Reports" section.
